title: 2024 Batch Course Start date (BSc.Psychology)
content: Hello, Any idea as to when this year's batch would start?, TIA

comments.body: Most programs at PES start around the first week of August. Although its best to ask someone in psych - maybe reach out to someone on PESU discord.
Thank you for your kind reply, appreciate it, I emailed PESU admissions, they were not really forthcoming with the dates... even tentative timelines...
Usually the first date of classes is the same across programs. But yeah as I said, reach out to a current first year.
Hi i am a first year student in bsc psych and mostly the classes start by first or second week of August
Visited pes last week and they told me it would start by the 22nd of this month i.e., July
